Translations.Text: A Nnbi! Eezzeb i Oebbi, ur ppa$ awal i ijehliyen akked ixabiten. Oebbi, s tidep, Izga d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
Ddu akked wayen i k d Ippuweeean, s$uo Mass ik. Ih, Oebbi Ippuxebbeo $ef wayen txedmem
Ppkel $ef Oebbi. Iqadd Oebbi d Awkil

Ur Irra ara Oebbi sin wulawen di tfekka n urgaz. Ur Irra ara tilawin nnwen, i tmetlem ar iarar n tyimmatin nnwen, d tiyimmatin nnwen. Ur irra ara wid id tessekrem, d tarwa nnwen. Ayagi, d awal nnwen, seg imawen nnwen. Oebbi Issawal tidep. Neppa Ippawi d ubrid

Ssiwlet asen am ibabaten nnsen; akka i iwqem ar Oebbi. Ma ur tessinen ara anwi ay d ibabaten nnsen, atmaten nnwen di ddin, d iqoiben nnwen. Ur illi u$ilif $ef wayen teffaliam degs, siwa ayen aammden wulawen nnwen. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

Nnbi iqoeb ar lmumnin, sennig iman nnsen. Tilawin is, d tiyimmatin nnsen. Wid ippemyilin, mqaoaben di Tezmamt n Oebbi, sennig lmumnin akked iminigen. Siwa ma tgam tajmilt i imeddukwal nnwen. Ayagi iura di Tezmamt
Mi Neiief si lambiyya lmitaq nnsen, u si kecc, si Nue, Iboahim, Musa, u si Aisa, mmi s n Meryem, Neiief segsen lmitaq lfayeq
iwakken ad Ietec imawlan n tidep, af tidep nnsen. Ihegga d, i ijehliyen, aaaqeb aqeoean
A wid iumnen! Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi. Mi d usan $uowen iasekoiwen, Nuzen asen d avu, akked iasekoiwen ur twalam. Oebbi Izga Ipwali ayen txeddmem
Mi wen d kkan sennig wen, seddawat wen, mi zzint wallen, ulawen bbwven s ijuxax, tepmeyyizem yal ameyyez $ef Oebbi
Dinna, ppwajeooben lmumnin, enhezzen s leqsee
Mi d nnan ixabiten, akked imehzulen n wul: "ay $ d Iwaaaed Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, siwa a$uoou
Mi d inna urbaa segsen: "a yAt Yatrib, ur illi umekkan i kunwi, u$alet"! Kra segsen ssutren tsrie i Nnbi, nnan: "ih, ixxamen nne$ aaran". Nitni, ur llin aaran, b$an kan ad rewlen
Ma kecmen ten id, si leriaf is, sinna, ssutren asen ad xubten, ad xubten. Cwii kan ara kukrun fellas
Ni$ llan auhden s Oebbi, uqbel, ar ur ppu$alen ar deffir. Aaahed s Oebbi ad ippuqeiii
Ini: "ur kwen tenfaa trewla, ma trewlem si tmeppant, ne$ si ioad. Ara tezhum, siwa tallit wezzilen
Ini: "anwa wa, ara kwen ikksen seg ufus n Oebbi, ma Ib$a yawen cceoo, ne$ Ib$a yawen aeunu"? Ur asen ppafen, war Oebbi, bab, ne$ asettao
